description:
Sakamoto starts to show up for practice. Miss Hiraizumi hears that Kurokan pays Sakamoto and feels worried. 
She arranges to meet with Dr. Hitomi to discuss about the situation. Hitomi just laughs and teels her to trust Kurokan. 
At this moment, a reporter from All Day News overhears their conversation and wishes to know the whole story.
Source: crunchyroll
